name: IPRO LFP File
summary: Learn about .LFP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LFP files not only specify which images to load, but they also define how to display the images. They include the file type, location, boundary information, and other data.

description: File used by IPRO Tech's litigation applications, which are used to generate and review legal documents; saved in a plain text format and contains commands used for loading images from a litigation database; helps construct digital views of images in legal proceedings.
